SELECT BOARD.BOARD_ID AS boardId, BOARD.WRITER, CASE WHEN CREATE_DATE IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') END AS createDate, CASE WHEN UPDATE_DATE IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') END AS updateDate, BOARD.TITLE, CATEGORY.NAME AS CATEGORY, BOARD.CONTENT FROM BOARD INNER JOIN CATEGORY ON CATEGORY.CD = BOARD.CATEGORY WHERE CREATE_DATE >= #{headDate} AND CREATE_DATE <= #{tailDate} AND (TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%'))
AND BOARD.CATEGORY = #{category}

SELECT BOARD.BOARD_ID as boardId, BOARD.TITLE, CATEGORY.NAME AS CATEGORY, BOARD.WRITER, BOARD.VIEWS, CASE WHEN CREATE_DATE IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') END AS createDate, CASE WHEN UPDATE_DATE IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') END AS updateDate, BOARD.CONTENT FROM BOARD INNER JOIN CATEGORY ON CATEGORY.CD = BOARD.CATEGORY WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
